title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 437.3 - Application procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 437.3 - Application procedures

State Regulations

Candidates are required to submit applications on forms to be
provided by the City of New York. Such forms may be obtained in person or by
written or telephoned request made to: City of New York Fire Department, Supervisory Training, New York City Fire Academy, Randalls Island, New York, NY
10035. Telephone (212) 860-9230. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
437.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
